entry.title: Prepare your own pesticides at home and keep soil fertile
entry.content:
farmers whose brothers buy at an expensive price and grow food grains in about 36.25 lakh hectares of land.  Farmers can prepare some compost pesticides in the farm itself.This will not only save money, but also will not harm the health of the earth.  It is time that the farmer now has to save on the cost of farming.Otherwise, farming will prove to be a loss deal for the farmer.  There are several methods by which farmers can prepare compost, compost or pesticide.Farmers were made aware of these techniques by distributing posters to Agro-Summit Faridabad.


Essential material for this

bio-essential grass leaf 1500 kg, soil 6 to 10 bucket, cow dung 300 kg, water as per requirement.Preparation time about 120 days.

Take precautions like this

Use earthworm isenia photida.The moisture in the bed is 40-60 percent, from 8 to 32 degrees Celsius, and the air movement goes on smoothly.

This is a benefit

Good manure can be made using domestic, rural, urban bio-industrial residues.This will have many benefits including reducing the problem of pollution.

Method

After going to Hodiban, spray the cow dung solution on its wall and floor.Make the first layer of grass leaf to 6 inch height, soak it with water.  Sprinkle 4 kg of cow dung solution in the second layer over the first layer made in 5 buckets of water.In the third layer, lay a layer of 50 to 60 kg of clean dense soil.Leap the crust from the raw dung and leave the cauldron.  When the filling material has been collected.

Method

Prepare a bed for earthworm mixed organic waste in 3: 1 with 15 days old cow dung.First, by laying 8 to 10 inches of superfluous waste, cover 1.5 to 2.5 inches of cow dung on it and then a layer of garbage cuttings and cover it with sack.Soak in water 3-4 days and leave earthworms carefully.

Essential material

15 days old dung organic residual, three to five kilograms of earthworms, 45 to 60 days of preparation time.

Organic farming will be beneficial for farmers

 Scientists call, farmers reduce costs in farming

Fertilizers - cow dung, cow urine, scorpion grass, compost.

 Neem, castor, bakan, agave, acacia, timaru, reetha, marigold, datura, sitaphal, bacha, evergreen, Nimundi, cinnamon, cuth, mahua, vine, kandari etc.

Method- Fill the selected local medicinal aromatic plants according to the available dishes,one third of the size.Add five percent of the volume of the vessel in the above material.Fill the remaining space according to the pot with water, after one day shake the above solution with a stick for five minutes in the morning, by filtering one liter of the solution with a cloth.Add a ratio of water in the filtered solution to a ratio of 10, use the solution in the morning or in the crop only in the evening.

Ingredients- cow-urinary flora

Benefits- It is a ready-made fertilizer, which is ready in 7 to 10 days.It acts as a catalyst.

Method- Fill the above material in a pitcher and bury it in the ground for a week.After one week, remove the prepared manure from the pitcher and dissolve it in 100 liters of water and spray it in one acre area.

Ingredients- Take one part cow dung, one part cow-urine, one part water, 250 grams jaggery.

Green manure is a boon for crops

The farmer, who is called the Annadata of the country, is facing many problems today.While on one hand it provides food to the country, on the other hand good quality information is not able to reach it, and in the un-knowing itself, the right crop cannot get that rich nutrition, due to which the level of the crop properly results.  - Can not flourish and in the end the farmers have to bear the loss, but today we have brought before you a solution to some problems related to the farmers.  By reading this, you too can get rid of the loss in your crop.Here, we are providing you information about the safety of crops and domestic fertilizer for improving them.

First of all, remember that as far as possible the crop should be made good in the natural way and today in this connection we are informing you about green manure.Yes, green manure ie green manure which is less than a boon for the crop.While green manure improves the structure of the crop on the one hand, on the other hand it also provides nutritional elements.If the amount of fiber content in the animal is high, it will have a good effect on the health of the animal.The same type of fiber fertilizer means more use of green manure in the fields is good for the health of the farm.  Green manure is a type of organic manure that is made by plucking the soon decomposable green plants, especially the pulses, and growing them in the same field and mixing them in the soil.The living and active soil is said to contain the same amount of bacteria.The food of bacteria is primordial organic material.The fertility of soil depends on the amount and activity of bacteria.Only organic, green manure and bacterial manure can permanently increase soil fertility.

Selection of crops for green manure

Selection of crops is necessary for green manure.

Granulated legume plants - peas, moong, urad, lovia, soybeans etc.

Grainy legume plants or leguminous plants with fodder - Sanai, Dhaincha, Styles, Sanji etc.

Non legume plants - Corn, sorghum, cannabis etc.

Keep in mind that whenever you are using green manure, pay attention to the following things-

The plant should be quick growing and have dense leaves.

Plants with drought, flood, rain and various temperatures.

Plants with quick and long-term atmospheric nitrogen fixation.

Good yielding plants by the end of 4-6 weeks.

Easily found in soil and fast rotting plants.

Disease and insect resistant plants.

Ability to produce even in low fertility.

Whenever you think of using green manure, take special care about the time of using it-

Usually, if there is a facility of irrigation after the first monsoon rains, then by applying first, more benefit and proper use of time can be done according to the crop cycle.

Time to mix green manure in the field

In most crops, the time for mowing the green manure crop comes within eight weeks of sowing.At this time maximum vegetative growth is done and the stems and roots are not hard. Most scientists are of the opinion that there should be a difference of at least two months between the time of suppressing the green manure crop and sowing the main crop.Well it depends on

Difficulties in using green manure

There is a lot of water in legume crop but due to the fiber in other crops, the amount of nitrogen in the main crop (which is to be planted after green manure) is reduced considerably.  Since green manure crop requires moisture to melt and sometimes green manure plants take moisture from the ground, which leads to drought conditions in the next crop.

Essential properties for green manure

The crop grows more in a short time.

The roots of the crop reach more depth.

Botanical growth of the crop, branches and leaves.

The vegetative parts of the crop should be soft.

Crop water is low

Reduced nutritional content.

The crop should tolerate different climatic conditions like overheating, low temperature, low or excess rainfall.

The insect should tolerate the attack of kites.

The crop should be able to grow in different types of soils.

You leave a good impression on the soil.


Crop seeds should be available at affordable rates.You grow quickly after harvesting.

Does the crop serve many purposes?  Fodder, rice, green manure, crop seed production capacity more yes.

Benefits of using green manure

This leads to increase in organic matter, which increases the activation of micro organisms.It provides many micro and macronutrients in the soil, such as nitrogen, phosphorus, potash, sulfur, calcium, magnesium etc.Soil borne disease is prevented.The physical properties of soil such as structure, water retention increase.Prevents the flow of essential nutrients.Amlik reduces the stabilization of phosphorus in soil.On average, 50 kg of nitrogen is obtained per hectare.  The use of green manure in paddy crop increases the availability of phosphorus and potash by 1012 percent.Green manure is not only a source of nitrogen and organic matter, but also many other essential nutrients are available in abundance in the soil.  Use of green manure also reduces soil brittleness, good air circulation, increase in water holding capacity, improve acidification / alkalinity and decrease soil erosion.The use of green manure increases the number and activity of microorganisms in the soil and the fertility and production capacity of the soil also increases.  Green manure also reduces soil diseases.By using it, chemical fertilizers can be reduced to sustainable farming.

Paddy Crop

In the first month of paddy harvest, in the month of May, sowing moong crop is done in 45 days in areas with irrigation facilities.After breaking the pods, pluck the stalks by mixing them in the field.after that, transplanting of paddy after 10-20 days.

Potato crop 

Before taking potato crop, cowpea, kulthi, guarfali etc.crops are taken as green manure.After breaking the pods, pluck the stalks and mix them in the field to rot.After 1520 days, we plant potatoes. 

After all, why green manure is necessary for the kharif crop - sowing short-duration pulses like moong with the first monsoon rains.After 45 days the first pods are harvested and pluck the remaining plants in the field.After this, take the late kharif crop.Sabul leaves and soft stalks mix well in the field with the first rain.After 10 days, kharif crops are sown.The green leaves of natural plants are used as green manure, for this, Footus, Evergreen, Chakor, Dhaincha, Karanja leaves, Water hyacinth etc. are used.  They are mixed and plowed in the field 15-20 days before planting or sowing the crop.Its quantity is applied at the rate of 15-20 tonnes per hectare depending on the availability.After the first monsoon rains, it is added when the field is moist.

entry.title: privacy policy
entry.content:
Privacy Policy for White Gold

At White Gold, accessible from https://www.whitegolds.in/, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by White Gold and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in White Gold. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

Consent

By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

Information we collect

The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.

When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.

How we use your information

We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

  • Provide, operate, and maintain our webste
  • Improve, personalize, and expand our webste
  • Understand and analyze how you use our webste
  • Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
  • Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the webste, and for marketing and promotional purposes
  • Send you emails
  • Find and prevent fraud

Log Files

White Gold follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Privacy Policy Generator and the Online Privacy Policy Generator.

Google DoubleClick DART Cookie

Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.website.com and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Advertising Partners Privacy Policies

You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of White Gold.

Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on White Gold, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.

Note that White Gold has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

Third Party Privacy Policies

White Gold's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.

CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)

Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:

Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.

Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.

Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.

If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

GDPR Data Protection Rights

We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:

The right to access You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.

The right to rectification You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.

The right to erasure You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.

The right to restrict processing You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

The right to object to processing You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

The right to data portability You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

Children's Information

Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

White Gold does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
